fomod.Name: SexLab Shrines(SLA)
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
Requirements: SKSE SexLab - Sex Animation Framework SexLab - Aroused
Immersive way to reduce character lewdness and raise purity by praying at Shrines of The Nine Divines once per day. Not compatible with mods that change TempleBlessingScript, DLC2TempleShrineScript
